Woocommerce Parser

The WoocommerceParser class extracts product price and currency information from the HTML page using BeautifulSoup to search for specific script tags:

  • Currency Extraction: The get_currency() method searches for a script tag with the type type=”application/ld+json” and extracts the currency if available.

  • Price Extraction: The get_price() method looks for a script tag with the type type=”application/ld+json” and extracts its value if available.

class crawler.web_crawler.parsers.WoocommerceParser.WoocommerceParser(logger: Logger, config: ConfigReader, soup: BeautifulSoup)
get_currency()

Extracts the product’s currency from the HTML page

Returns:

The currency of the product, or None if no currency is found or an error occurs.

Return type:

Optional[str]

Raises:

Any exceptions raised during the HTML parsing will be logged and re-raised.

get_price() → float | None

Extracts the product price from the HTML page

Returns:

The parsed price of the product, or None if no price is found or an error occurs.

Return type:

Optional[float]

Raises:

Any exceptions raised during the HTML parsing will be logged and re-raised.
